Question content: Ezimalini, kuyini isikweletu?
Explanation: Isikweletu imali ongayiboleka njenge {loan}, noma isikweletu sento ongekwazi ukuyikhokhela ngo {cash} njengendlu, okwazi ukuyibuyisela ngokuhamba kwesikhathi (ehamba nenzalo ngenjwayelo)

Question content: Kuyini igama lemali ongayiboleka?
Explanation: Isikweletu imali ongayiboleka njenge {loan}, noma isikweletu sento ongekwazi ukuyikhokhela ngo {cash} njenge moto, okwazi ukuyibuyisela ngokuhamba kwesikhathi (ehamba nenzalo ngenjwayelo)

Question content: Imali ongakhetha ukuyiboleka uma uyidinga ibizwa ngani?
Explanation: Isikweletu ({credit}) imali ongakhetha ukuyiboleka uma ukwazi ukuyibuyisela ngesikhathi esishiwo esivumelwaneni. Uma usuyibolekile leyo mali, iba yisikweletu ({debt})

Question content: Yini igama lomuntu noma ibhizinisi la ongathola khona isikweletu ({credit})?
Explanation: Ngokwenjwayelo, umuntu okunika isikweletu ({credit}) umukweletisi. Umkweletisi engaba {formal} noma ebe {informal}, o{formal} usuke erejistiwe futhi ubizwa nge {{registered credit provider}}

Question content: Iziphi kwezibaliwe ekuyigama eli {formal} lom'kweletisi?
Explanation: Abakweletisi banikana isikweletu ({credit}) esingaba yi {loan} noma inani elithile ongathenga ngalo (kanjenge {account} esitolo sezimpahla). Phecelezi, mkweletisi ubizwa nge {{credit provider}}

Question content: Isikweletu ({credit}) imali ongayiboleka uma ufuna
Explanation: Isikweletu imali ongayiboleka ukuthenga into. Lemali ingaba ngukheshi, noma izoba yisikweletu sento ongakhoni ukuyikhokhela ngokheshi manje manje njenge moto

Question content: Abakweletisi abantu namabhizinisi ongathola isikweletu ({credit}) kubona
Explanation: Abakweletisi banika abantu izikweletu ({credit}) eziyimali kanjenge {loan} kanye neziyinani ongathenga ngalo izinto esikweletini. Igama elisemthethweni lomkweletisi yi {{credit provider}} phecelezi

Question content: Ingabe i{{credit provider}} igama eli {formal} lokubiza umkweletisi?
Explanation: Ama {credit provider} amabhizinisi anika imali esikweletini ({credit}) nama amasevisi kanjengama {credit card} nama {overdraft}

Question content: Ingabe i{{cash loan}} uhlobo lwesikweletu na?
Explanation: Ziningi izinhlobo zezikweletu ({credit}) kanjengama {credit card}, isikweletu sokuthenga imoto ({vehicle finance}), ama {loan} okukhokhela indlu nezikweletu ezemali phecelezi {cash loan}

Question content: Yini kulezi ezijwayele ukuthengwa esikweletini?
Explanation: Abantu abaningi bathenga izindlu ngesikweletu se {home loan} ngoba abanayo imali eyanele yokukhokhela indlu manje manje. Kungathatha iminyaka engu 20 ukukhokha sonke isikweletu sendlu

Question content: Isikweletu esibizwa nge {credit} sihluke kuphi esikweletini esibizwa nge {debt}?
Answer: i{Credit} iba yi {debt} uma ususithatha isikweletu
Explanation: i{Credit} ne {debt} kucishe kufane. i{Credit} imali ongakhona ukuyiboleka, bese uma uyithatha leyo mali iba yisikweletu osikweletayo esibizwa nge {debt}. i{Debt} ibala inzalo

Question content: Imali oyikweletayo ibizwa ngani?
Explanation: Ezimalini, isikweletu ({debt}) imali oyikweletayo kumuntu noma kuyinkampani. Uma izikweletu zakho ({debt}) zincane, unamathuba amakhudlwana okuba ne {financial security}

Question content: Imali oyikweletayo emveni kokuthatha isikweletu ibizwa ngani?
Explanation: i{Credit} ne {debt} kucishe kufane. i{Credit} imali ongakhona ukuyiboleka, bese uma uyithatha leyo mali iba yisikweletu osikweletayo esibizwa nge {debt}. i{Debt} ibala inzalo

Question content: Ukuthola isikweletu ebhange noma esitolo esihloniphekile, kumele wenze ini kuqala?
Explanation: Umkweletisi ohloniphekile (ikakhulu orejistile ekubeni yi {NCA credit provider}) uzobheka ukuthi ungakwazi yini ukukhokhela isikweletu ngemuva kokukunika isivumelwano

Question content: Imali osuyibolekile isikweletu se {debt}
Explanation: i{Credit} ne {debt} kucishe kufane. i{Credit} imali ongayiboleka, bese uma uyithatha leyo mali iba yisikweletu osikweletayo phecelezi i{debt} la okungena khona izinazlo

Question content: i{Credit} imali osuyibolekile
Explanation: Isikweletu okiyi {credit} imali okhetha ukuyiboleka kuze ukhokhele into engekwazi ukuyikhokhela kulowo mzuzu, be i{debt} kuba yisikweletu osusibolekile osikweletayo

Question content: Ungathola i{credit} eningi kumkweletisi ngisho ungenalo iholo
Explanation: Umkweletisi ohloniphekile (ikakhulu orejistile ekubeni yi {NCA credit provider}) uzobheka ukuthi ungakwazi yini ukukhokhela isikweletu ngemuva kokukunika isivumelwano uma uzokhona ukusikhokhela

Question content: Kuyini isizathu sokuthatha isikweletu?
Explanation: i{Credit} imali esetshenziswa ngabantu uma bengenayo imali eyanele bebodwa. Lemali ingaba yisivumelwano sokukhokhela into oyifunayo, i{revolving credit}, kanye {loan} es'khathini esivunyelwene

Question content: Yini kulezi ejwayele ukuthengwa ngesikweletu?
Explanation: i{Credit} ijwayele ukusetshenziselwa izinto ezinkulu ezibizayo kanjengendlu nemoto. Izinto ezincane zijwayele ukuthengwa ngemali onayo

Question content: Yini kulezi ejwayele ukuthengwa ngesikweletu?
Explanation: i{Credit} ijwayele ukusetshenziselwa izinto ezinkulu ezibizayo kanjengendlu nemoto. Izinto ezincane zijwayele ukuthengwa ngemali onayo

Question content: Yini kulezi ekuyisibonela sesikweletu ekuyi {credit}?
Explanation: Uma uthola into oyikhokhela kancane kancane ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, ungena esivumelwaneni sesikweletu futhi ujwayele ukukhokha inzalo

Question content: Ungathola i{credit} uma une {credit card} kuphela
Explanation: Ama {credit card} aluhlobo lwesikweletu se {credit}. Ungafaka isicelo sezikweletu ezingasiwo ama {credit card} kuphela, kanjenge {loan} noma i{account} esitolo sezimpahla

Question content: Njalo uma uthenga ngesikweletu usuke uboleka imali
Explanation: i{Credit} ne {debt} kucishe kufane. i{Credit} imali ongayiboleka, bese uma uyithatha leyo mali iba yisikweletu osikweletayo phecelezi i{debt} la okungena khona izinzalo

Question content: Uma ufuna ukuthenga into manje uyikhokhela ngesinye isikhathi, ungenza ini?
Explanation: i{Credit} inika abantu indlela yokuthenga izinto abazifunayo ngaphandle kokukhokha yonke imali ngesikhathi sinye. Lemali bengayikhokha ngokuhambha kwesikhathi ngesivumelwano size siphele isikweletu

Question content: Yini kwezibhaliwe echaza ukuthenga ngesikweletu?
Explanation: i{Credit} inika abantu indlela yokuthenga izinto abazifunayo ngaphandle kokukhokha yonke imali ngesikhathi sinye. Lemali bengayikhokha ngokuhambha kwesikhathi ngesivumelwano size siphele isikweletu

Question content: Uma uthenga imoto nge {vehicle finance}, uyithenga ngesikweletu
Explanation: Uma uthenga imoto ({finance a car}), umkweletisi noma i{bank} liyayithenga imoto liyinike wena bese wena ukhokhela bona uze usiqede leso sikweletu ngesikhathi sesivumelwano

Question content: Uma uthatha i{home loan}, uthenga indlu/i{flat} ngesikweletu
Explanation: Uma uthola i{home loan}, umkweletisi okuyi {bank} noma indawo ye {finance}, uthenga leyo moto bese wena uyamukhokhela uze uqede ukukhokha ngesikhathi

Question content: Uma usebenzisa i{account} yasesitolo ukuthenga izicathulo ezintsha, uzithenga ngesikweletu
Explanation: Ama {account} ezitolo anika abantu indlela yokuthenga bengenayo imali ngaleso sikhathi. Lolu uhlobo le {revolving credit} kanjenge {credit card}

Question content: Uma uthenga ngesikweletu, ugcina ukhokhe kakhulu kunenani laleyonto
Explanation: Uma uqeda ukukhokhela into oyithenge ngesikweletu, uzothola ukuthi ukhokhe imali eningi kunenani laleyonto. Isizathu ukuthi abakweletisi bafaka inzalo ukukweletisa

Question content: Kumele uthathe isikweletu uma ukwazi ukusikhokhela
Explanation: Ukuthatha isikweletu kungaba yinto elungile ukuzithuthukisa empilweni uthole izinto ongakhoni ukuzithola ngesikhathi esithile. Kungaba yingozi kodwa uma ukweleta kakhulu ungasakhoni ukukhokha

Question content: Yini kwezibhaliwe echaza ukunika abantu izikweletu uma bekwazi ukuzikhokhela?
Explanation: Abakweletisi, kakhulu ababhalisiwe, kumele beqiniseke ukuthi umuntu okweletayo engakwazi ukukhokha imali yesikweletu. Lokhu kubizwa ngokubolekisa nomthwalo wemfanelo ({responsible lending})

Question content: Uma uthola isikweletu ongakwazi ukusikhokha kubizwa ngani?
Explanation: Ukukweletisa imali okungekho {responsible} ukunika abantu izikweletu ungabi nendaba ukuthi bayakhona yini ukukhokha leyo mali abayikweletayo nokuthi bazoba {stuck} ezikweletini

Question content: Elinye igama elisho ukubolekisa ebantwini abangakwazi ukukhokha yiliphi?
Explanation: Isivumelwano sesikweletu la umuntu engakhoni ukukhokha isikweletu kahle nje kusuka ukubolekisa okuyi {reckless lending}. i{Reckless lending} ifaka abantu ezikweletini abangeke bekwazi ukuphuma kuzo

Question content: Ukuboleka okubizwa nge {reckless spending} kwenzeka uma umkweletisi enika abantu izikweletu bengekuzikhona?
Explanation: Isivumelwano sesikweletu la umuntu engakhoni ukukhokha isikweletu kahle nje kusuka ukubolekisa okuyi {reckless lending}. i{Reckless lending} ifaka abantu ezikweletini abangeke bekwazi ukuphuma kuzo

Question content: Ibaphi kulaba abangarejistile njengomkweletisi ({registered credit provider})
Explanation: oMashonisa banika izikweletu ezingahlelekile ({informal}) futhi abarejistanga ukukweletisa imali. Ukubolekisa imali ungarejistanga akukho emthethweni, ngokusho kwe {National Credit Act} ka 2005

Question content: Kumele umuntu ekutshene ukuthi thatha i{loan} ngisho ungekwazi ukuyikhokha?
Explanation: Uma kubonakala ingathi i{customer} angeke likwazi ukukhokha imali yesikweletu ngesikhathi esibekiwe esivumelwaneni, umkweletisi ukufanele avume ukunika leyo {customer} isikweletu

Question content: Akumile kahle ukubolekisa imali kumuntu ongakhoni ukuyikhokha
Explanation: Abakweletisi, kakhulu ababhalisiwe, kumele beqiniseke ukuthi umuntu okweletayo uyakhona ukukhokha leyo mali yesikweletu. K'shuthi kumele bengabaniki abantu abangakwazi ukukhokha izikweletu

Question content: Uma isikweletu sakho siloku sinyuka ungakhoni ukusikhokha, ubizwa ngokuthini?
Explanation: Ukuba {overindebted} yitemu lokuchaza umuntu ongasakhoni ukukhokhela izikweletu zakhe zama {loan}, ama {account}, noma ama {credit card}. Lokhu kungenzeka uma uthatha izikweletu eziningi kakhulu.

Question content: Usuke unjani uma u{overindebted}?
Explanation: Ukuba {overindebted} yitemu lokuchaza umuntu ongasakhoni ukukhokhela izikweletu zakhe zama {loan}, ama {account}, noma ama {credit card}. Lokhu kungenzeka uma uthatha izikweletu eziningi kakhulu.

Question content: Ungaba njani uma unezikweletu ongakhoni ukuzikhokha?
Explanation: Ukuba {overindebted} yitemu lokuchaza umuntu ongasakhoni ukukhokhela izikweletu zakhe zama {loan}, ama {account}, noma ama {credit card}. Lokhu kungenzeka uma uthatha izikweletu eziningi kakhulu

Question content: Ingozi yokuthatha izikweletu eziningi ukuthi ungaba {overindebted}
Explanation: Uma uthatha izikweletu eziningi kakhulu, uzoba nezikweletu eziningi okumele uzikhokhele ekupheleni kwenyanga kanye nezindleko zakho. Lokhu kubizwa ngokuba {overindebted}

Question content: Kuchaza ukuthini ukuba {overindebted}?
Explanation: Ukuba {overindebted} yisimo sezimali la umuntu engakhoni khona ukukhokhela zonke izikweletu zakhe. Lokhu kungenza umuntu agcine eminza ezikweletini ngokuhambha kwesikhathi

Question content: Yini kulezi ekungesiso isikweletu ({credit})?
Explanation: Ama {Lay}-{by} awasiso isikweletu ngoba uma uthenga nge {Lay}-{by} awuyithathi into uze uqede ukuyikhokha

Question content: Ukuthenga nge {Lay}-{by} kuyafana yini nokuthenga ngesikweletu?
Explanation: Ama {Lay}-{by} awasiso isikweletu ngoba uma uthenga nge {Lay}-{by} awuyithathi into uze uqede ukuyikhokha

Question content: i{Lay}-{by} enye indlela yokusebenzisa isikweletu ukuthenga utho
Explanation: Ama {Lay}-{by} awasiso isikweletu ngoba uma uthenga nge {Lay}-{by} awuyithathi into uze uqede ukuyikhokha

Question content: Ukuthenga nge {Lay}-{by} yindlela yokuthenga into hhayi ngesikweletu, futhi ukwenza {sho} ukuthi ayithengiselwa omunye?
Explanation: Ama {Lay}-{by} awasiso isikweletu ngoba uma uthenga nge {Lay}-{by} awuyithathi into uze uqede ukuyikhokha

Question content: Kuyini ukukweletisa oku {formal} ({formal credit})?
Explanation: i{Formal credit} ukubolekisa kwemali okuhambelana nemithetho ebekwe yi {National Credit Act} ka 2005 efakwa ekusebenzeni yi {National Credit Regulator} ({NCR})

Question content: Iyiphi kulama temu echaza umkweletisi o{formal}?
Explanation: eNingizimu Afrika, i{registered credit provider} ekungimubolekisi orejistiwe ichaza i{bank}, isitolo, noma indawo ebolekisa imali ehambelana nemithetho ye {National Credit Regulator}

Question content: Babizwa ngani ababolekisi abahambisana nemithetho?
Explanation: Ababolekisi aba {formal} ababolekisi abarejistiwe kanjenge {bank}, isitolo, noma indawo ebolekisa imali ehambelana nemithetho ye {NCR} asebenza ngendlela ebhekekile

Question content: Iziphi kwezibaliwe ezinikana i{formal credit}?
Explanation: Ababolekisi aba {formal} ababolekisi abarejistiwe kanjenge {bank}, isitolo, noma indawo ebolekisa imali ehambelana nemithetho ye {NCR} asebenza ngendlela ebhekekile

Question content: Kuyini i{informal credit}?
Explanation: Ukubolekisa okungekho {formal} ukubolekisa okungahambelani nemithetho ebekiwe. Lokubolekisa kuphatha ama {loan} avela ebanganini noma emndenini, kanye nomashonisa

Question content: Iziphi kwezibaliwe eziyi sikweletu esinga lawulwanga ({unregulated credit})?
Explanation: Imali oyibolekwa ngumgani i{informal} ngoba ekujwayelekile umgani erejistele ukuba yi {credit provider}. Isikweletu silawulwa nguwe nomgani

Question content: Iziphi kwezibaliwe eziyi {informal credit}?
Explanation: Imali oyiboleka kumashonisa i{Informal} ngoba omashonisa abasibo abakweletisi abarejistile ukuba yi {registered credit provider}. Uma ekunika isikweletu, nguye okhethayo ukuthi ukhokha kanjani

Question content: Ngokomthetho wokuthenga, umele ini u{NCR}?
Explanation: u{NCR} umele i{National Credit Regulator}. Ababolekisi abalandela imithetho ebekwe yi {NCR}, ebekwe ukuvikela labo abadinga imali, babizwa ngama {{registered credit provider}}

Question content: Isiphi isikhungo esenza {sho} ukuthi ababolekisi balandela imithetho?
Explanation: Ngokomthetho, ababolekisi bamele ukubhalisa ne {National Credit Regulator}({NCR}). Uma abakweletisi bengawulandeli umthetho, bebgaluza umumo wabo ekubeni yi {registered credit provider}

Question content: Ingabe i{National Credit Regulator}({NCR}) iyisikhungo sikahulumeni?
Explanation: {National Credit Regulator} iyisikhunga sikahulumeni esisebenzela ukuvikelwa nokunakekelwa kwamalungelo abantu abadinga usizo ngokwemali

Question content: Ababolekisi ababhalisiwe ne {National Credit Regulator} babizwa ngokuthini?
Explanation: e{South Africa}, ababolekisi abangama {registered credit provider} kanjengama {bank}, izitolo, nezindawo zokubolekisa, babhalisile ne {NCR}, futhi bavunyelwe ukubolekisa imali emthethweni

Question content: i{National Credit Regulator} yenza isiqiniseko ukuthi abakweletisi balandela umthetho
Explanation: Umsebenzi we {National Credit Regulator} ukwenza abakweletisi kanye nabantu ababoleka imali belandele umthetho we {National Credit Act} ka 2005

Question content: i{NCR} ivikela umphakathi ekubolekeni imali okunganamqondo
Explanation: {National Credit Regulator} iyisikhunga sikahulumeni esisebenzela ukuvikelwa nokunakekelwa kwamalungelo abantu abadinga usizo ngokwemali

Question content: Ngokomthetho, kumele ube nani kuze ube umubolekisi wemali?
Explanation: Uma kukhona umuntu othola imali ngokubolekisa imali ebuya nenzalo, kumele bebhalise ne {National Credit Regulator} {otherwise} basebenza ngokungemthetho

Question content: Iyiphi kulezinto ekuyindlela engemthetho yokwenza umuntu ekhokhe imali ayikweletayo?
Explanation: Abakweletisi abasemthethweni ({registered credit providers}) abasebenzisi udlame nokuxhaphaza ukuqiniseka ukukhokha kwakho

Question content: Umkweletisi osemthethweni okuyi {registered credit provider} engayithatha yini i{ID} yakho?
Explanation: Ubuhle bokuboleka kumkweletisi womthetho ({registered credit provider}) ukuthi kunemithetho esho ukuthi bavumeleke ukukuphatha kanjani. Abavumelekile ukubambha i{ID} yakho ngisho ungakhokhanga kahle

Question content: Umkweletisi osemthethweni okuyi {registered credit provider} engakuxhaphaza yini akuthuse?
Explanation: Ubuhle bokuboleka kumkweletisi womthetho ({registered credit provider}) ukuthi kunemithetho esho ukuthi bavumeleke ukukuphatha kanjani. Abavumelekile ukukwethusa noma ukusebenzisa udlame

Question content: Umkweletisi osemthethweni ({registered credit provider}) engasakaza ukuthi kukhona isikweletu ongasikhokhanga na?
Explanation: Ubuhle bokuboleka kumkweletisi womthetho ({registered credit provider}) ukuthi kunemithetho esho ukuthi bavumeleke ukukuphatha kanjani. Akujwayelekile ukuthi abantu bazi ukuthi awukhoonanga ukukhokha

Question content: Iziphi kulezi {{ekungasiyo}} i{{registered credit provider}}?
Explanation: Ngokwencaso, omashonisa ababhiliswanga ne NCR. Lokhu kusho ukuthi abasebenzi ngokusemthethweni kwe {National Credit Regulator}

Question content: Iziphi kulezi ezichaza umashonisa?
Explanation: Omashonisa benza imali ngokubolekisa izimali ezincane bengabhalisanga kuyi {National Credit Regulator}

Question content: Iliphi kulamatemu elizetshenziswa ngesilungu ukuchaza omashonisa
Explanation: Igama {Loan shark} lisebenza ngesilungu endaweni yamashonisa. Liyigama elingelihle elichaza ukuthi umkweletisi uthatha i{advantage} emntwini ohluphekile

Question content: Isilinganiso senzalo ({interest rate}) komashonisa sijwayele ukuba nkulu kunalesi esibekwe ngumthetho
Explanation: Omashonisa bafaka inzalo eningi esikweletini, phakathi kwa 30% no 50% wemali ebolekiwe. Lenzalo iningi kakhulu kunenzalo evela kubakweletisi abangama {registered credit provider} ababhalisile ne {NCR}

Question content: Ibaphi kwababaliwe abangakunika iplani lokukhokha uma kukhona imali ongayikhokhile?
Explanation: Abakweletisi bomthetho bajwayele ukwenza iplani elisha lokukhokha kancane kancane uma kunemali ongayikhokhanga. Lokhu kubizwa nge {payment arrangement}

Question content: Omashonisa bajwayele ukulandela imithetho ebekwe yi {NCR} uma bekweletisa imali
Explanation: Abanye omashonisa banozwelo, kodwa akunasiqiniseko sokuthi bazolandela umthetho ngoba akukho sikhungo esibabhekayo uma bengenzi kahle

Question content: Igama {{Loan shark}} lijwayele ukusetshenziswa ukuchaza {{omashonisa}}
Explanation: Igama {loan shark} lisetshenziswa ukuchaza omashonisa kanjengabantu abathatha i{advantage} uma uhluphekile

Question content: Abakweletisi bomthetho bajwayele ukufaka inzalo encane kunenzalo efakwa ngomashonisa
Explanation: Abakweletisi bomthetho ({registered credit providers}) abafaki inzalo engeningi ngoba bavinjwe umthetho, kanti futhi bayabacwaningisisa abantu abafaka izicelo bese bebasayinisa ama {contract} omthetho

Question content: Ukuphula umthetho yini ukuboleka komashonisa?
Explanation: Akusikho ukuphula umthetho ukuthola umashonisa. Kodwa kungukuphula umthetho ukubolekisa imali uma ungumashonisa. Ngokuboleka komashonisa, uxhasa ibhizinisi eliphula umthetho

Question content: Omashonisa babhalisiwe yini ne {National Credit Regulator}?
Explanation: Omashonisa benza imali ngentela yokubolekisa imali bengabhalisile ne {National Credit Regulator}. Lokhu kusho ukuthi baphula umthetho

Question content: Ibaphi kwababaliwe abazokufakela inzalo eningi esikweletini ngokujwayelekile?
Explanation: Omashonisa bafaka inzalo eningi esikweletini, phakathi kwa 30% no 50% wemali ebolekiwe. Lenzalo iningi kakhulu kunenzalo evela kubakweletisi abangama {registered credit provider} ababhalisile ne {NCR}

Question content: Imali {{engaphezulu kwesikweletu}} okumele uyikhokhe uma uboleka imali ibizwa ngani?
Explanation: Inzalo imali oyikhokha ngaphezulu kwemali yesikweletu osithathile. Kahle kahle imali oyikhokhayo uma uboleka imali

Question content: Inzalo imali {{oyikhokha ngaphezulu}} kwemali yesikweletu semali oyibolekile
Explanation: Inzalo imali oyikhokha ngaphezulu kwemali yesikweletu osithathile. Kahle kahle imali olikhokhayo uma uboleka imali

Question content: Abakweletisi bayenza kanjani imali ekubolekiseni imali?
Explanation: Ungayibheka inzalo njenge nani lokuboleka imali ngoba imali oyikhokha ngaphezulu kwemali oyibolekile. Abakweletisi bayenza kanje imali

Question content: Kokubaliwe, yini echaza inzalo yesikweletu kancono?
Explanation: Inzalo yenza ukuboleka kusebenzele umkweletisi nomkweleti. Umkweleti uyakwazi ukukhokhela izinto zakhe, umkweletisi wenza imali ngokubolekisa

Question content: Iziphi izinto ezingaba nentela kwezibaliwe?
Explanation: Wonke umuntu osebenza ukubolekisa imali ufaka inzalo esikweletini. Inzalo inani lokuboleka imali

Question content: Ijwayele ukubalwa kanjani inzalo?
Explanation: Inzalo yingxenye yemali oyibolekile nge {percent}. Uma uboleka R5000 kumuntu ozoku {charger} 10%, uzokhokha R5500 (R5000 + R500)

Question content: Isilinganiso senzalo esikweletini saziwa ngani?
Explanation: Itemu {interest rate} lichaza isilinganiso senzalo esikweletini. Kusho ukuthi u 10% {p}/{a} uchaza ukuthi uzokhokha u 10% wesikweletu ngonyaka

Question content: Inzalo esikweletini imali yokuboleka imali
Explanation: Wonke umuntu osebenza ukubolekisa imali ufaka inzalo esikweletini. Inzalo inani lokuboleka imali

Question content: Kujwayelekile na ukuthi umkweletisi afake inzalo eskweletini?
Explanation: Akujwayelekile ukuthola isikweletu esingenanzalo. Uma abakweletisi bengakhokhelwa nzalo, angeke benze mali ngokubolekisa

Question content: Amabhizinisi abolekisa imali akushaja inzalo kuze ezothola nawo imali ngokusebenza ngokukweletisa imali
Explanation: Abazali nabangani abakuboleka imali bengafaki nzalo bayekela ukuthi abadingi ukwenza imali ngawe. Abakweletisi kodwa bayadinga ukuhola ngokukweletisa imali

Question content: Inzalo inani lokuboleka imali
Explanation: Inzalo imali oyikhokha ngaphezulu kwesikweletu osithathile. Inani olikhokhayo lokuboleka imali ngamanye amazwi

Question content: Imali yonke oyikhokhela umkweletisi ibizwa ngani?
Explanation: Inani lesikweletu imali yonke oyinika umkweletisi. Ibala imali oyibolekile kanye nenzalo (nezinye izimali zama {administraion fee} uma zingena)

Question content: Ngokwezimali, kuyini inani lesikweletu ekuyi {{cost of credit}}?
Explanation: Ngokwezimali zokubolekwa ezi {simple}, i{cost of credit} ifaka imali oyibolekile kanye nenzalo. Kungaba khona ezinye izimali ngaphezulu

Question content: Elinye igama elisetshenziswa endaweni ye {{cost of credit}} lithini?
Explanation: i{Total cost of credit} ifana ne {cost of credit}. Abakweletisi bomthetho bajwayele ukusho lelinani ekuyilona ozolibuyisela. Libala inzalo nemali yokusebenza ({administration fee})

Question content: i{{Total cost of credit}} yimali oyikhokha ngokugcwele kumkweletisi
Explanation: i{Total cost of credit} ifana ne {cost of credit}. Abakweletisi bomthetho bajwayele ukusho lelinani ekuyilona ozolibuyisela. Libala inzalo nemali yokusebenza ({administration fee})

Question content: i{Cost of credit} imali umuntu ayibolekile
Explanation: i{Cost of credit}, ngokwezimali ezi {formal}, ibala imali oyibolekile esikweletini kanye nenzalo nezimali zokusebenza ekukunikeni isikweletu

Question content: Ingabe i{cost of credit} ekuyinani lesikweletu nenzalo kuyafana na?
Explanation: i{Cost f credit}, ngokwezimali ezi {formal}, ibala imali oyibbolekile esikweletini kanye nenzalo nezimali zokusebenza ekukunikeni isikweletu

Question content: Kujwayele ukuba ne {risk} ethile uma kukhona okuboleka imali
Explanation: Kuhlale kukhona i{risk} ekubolekeni imali. Ngisho umkweletisi engalandela izinyathelo zokubona ukuthi uyakwazi na ukukhokha, isasekhona i{risk}

Question content: Iziphi kulezi ezingathinta ukwenzeka kwesikweletu?
Explanation: Kuhlale kukhona i{risk} ekubolekeni imali. Ngisho umkweletisi engalandela izinyathelo zokubona ukuthi uyakwazi na ukukhokha, isasekhona i{risk}

Question content: Kuyenzeka yini kungabikho {risk} ekukweletiseni?
Explanation: Kuhlale kukhona i{risk} ekubolekeni imali. Ngisho umuntu okweletayo enemali eningi, isasekhona i{risk} uma kuvela ingozi

Question content: Abakweletisi bayabheka yini ukukhokha kwakho izikweletu osewazithatha uku{decide}'a ukuthi bayakunika imali na?
Explanation: Inzalo esikweletini ithintwa yi {risk} ebhekene nomuntu okweletayo. i{Risk} ingathintwa yizinto ezifana ne {security} yesikweletu

Question content: Ikhona i{risk} ekukweletiseni umuntu othembekile onemali
Explanation: Kuhlale kukhona i{risk} ekubolekeni imali. Ngisho umuntu okweletayo enemali eningi, isasekhona i{risk} uma kuvela ingozi engamenza engakwazi ukukhokha isikweletu

Question content: Iziphi kulezi ezibaliwe engakunyusela inzalo esikweletini?
Explanation: Inzalo esikweletini ithinteka kakhulu i{risk} ephathelene nokukukweletisela. Ziningi izinto ezithinta i{risk}, kanjengokuthi isikweletu sakho sivikeleke kanjani

Question content: Esikweletini, i{risk} ephezulu ingenza ukuthi ini futhi ibe phezulu?
Explanation: Inzalo esikweletini ithinteka kakhulu i{risk} ephathelene nokukukweletisela. Ziningi izinto ezithinta i{risk}, kanjengokuthi isikweletu sakho sivikeleke kanjani

Question content: Iziphi izinto kwezibaliwe ezingakwenza ube yi {risk} ukukweletisela?
Explanation: Inzalo esikweletini ithinteka kakhulu ukuthi ungasikhokha kanjani leso sikweletu. Uma uboleka okokuqala, awaziwa ukuthi ukhokha izikweletu kanjani

Question content: Ngokwezimali nokukweletisa, i{risk} isho amathuba omuntu okungakhokhi imali ayibolekile
Explanation: Abakweletisi bazobheka ukuthi ingakanani i{risk} esekukubolekeni imali. Bakunika impendula nesivumelwano ethintwa yilokho

Question content: I{risk} enkulu ihambhelana nenzalo encane
Explanation: Izinto esifana nama {personal loan} zine {risk} enkulu okusho ukuthi inzalo yakhona izoba nkulu. Uma i{risk} ephethelene nokukweletisa iphansi, inzalo izoba phansi

Question content: I{risk} encane kumkweletisi ngawe ihambhelana nenzalo eningi emalini yesikweletu
Explanation: Izinto esifana nama {personal loan} zine {risk} enkulu okusho ukuthi inzalo yakhona izoba nkulu. Uma i{risk} ephethelene nokukweletisa iphansi, inzalo izoba phansi

Question content: I{risk} enkulu kumkweletisi ngawe ihambelana nenzalo eningi emalini yesikweletu
Explanation: Izinto ezifana nama {personal loan} zine {risk} enkulu okusho ukuthi inzalo yakhona izoba nkulu. Uma i{risk} ephathelene nokukweletisa iphansi, inzalo izoba phansi

Question content: Ukuba se {risk}ini kwakho kuyayithinta inzalo emalini oyikweletayo
Explanation: Inzalo esikweletini ithinteka kakhulu ukuthi ungasikhokha kanjani leso sikweletu. Uma uboleka okokuqala, awaziwa ukuthi ukhokha izikweletu kanjani

Question content: Ibizwa ngani into ovuma ukuyinika umkweletisi uma ungasakhoni ukukhokha isikweletu?
Explanation: Uma uboleka imali noma ukuthatha isikweletu, umkweletisi engafuna i{security} ekuyinto yakho ebiza imali engakhokhela isikweletu okumele unike umkweletisi yona uma ungakhoni ukukhokha

Question content: Yini kwezibhaliwe ekungelinye igama le {{security}}?
Explanation: i{Security} yesikweletu yitemu eli {formal} elisho ukuqiniseka kukamkweletisi ekutholeni imali yakhe uma ungakhoni ukukhokha

Question content: Yini kwezibhaliwe ekungelinye igama le {{security of debt}}?
Explanation: i{Security} enye indlela yokuchaza i{security of debt}, ekuyinto yakho ebiza imali engakhokha isikweletu okumele unike umkweletisi yona

Question content: Uma uvuma ukunika umkweletisi impahla yakho uma ungakhoni ukukhokha, isikweletu sinjani?
Explanation: Isikweletu singaba ne {security} uma uvuma ukunika umkweletisi impahla yakho eziba imali uma uhluleka ukukhokha imali oyikweletayo

Question content: Kwenzeka ini nge {security} uma ungakhoni ukukhokha imali yesikweletu?
Explanation: Uma ungakhoni ukukhokha isikweletu, umkweletisi kuzoba ngeyakhe impahla yakho ovume ukuyenza i{security}

Question content: Kwenzekala ini uma wenza i{loan} ibe {secure}?
Explanation: Uma isikweletu sine {security}, inzalo esikweletini ijwayele ukuba ncane kuna mangabe ungafakanga {security} ngoba i{risk} incane

Question content: i{Security} yimpahla yakho ovuma ukunika umkweletisi uma ungakhoni ukukhokha isikweletu?
Explanation: Uma uthatha isikweletu, umkweletisi engacela ukuthi ube ne {security} ekuyinto yakho ebiza imali engakhokha isikweletu okumele unike umkweletisi yona ekuzoba ngeyakhe uma uhluleka ukukhokha

Question content: Yini kwezibhaliwe eyisibonela sesikweletu esi {secure}?
Explanation: i{Home loan} ine {security} ngoba indlu iba yi{security}. Uma uyeka noma ungasakhoni ukukhokha futhi ungenzi iplani, indlu yakho ingathathwa yi {bank}

Question content: Yini kwezibhaliwe eyisibonelo sesikweletu esi {secure}?
Explanation: Uma wenza ukushiya into yakho kuze uzothola imali, kubizwa nge {pawn transation}. Ungena esivumelwaneni esi {secure}. Imali oyitholayo iba {secure} ngento onike yona umkweletisi

Question content: Ukuthenga imoto nge {vehicle finance} isibonelo sesikweletu esi {secure}
Explanation: Isikweletu semoto {vehicle finance} isikweletu esine {security}. Uma uyeka noma ungasakhoni ukukhokha futhi ungenzi iplani, imoto yakho ingathathwa yi {bank}

Question content: Uma ufaka i{security} ukuthola isikweletu, sibizwa ngokuthi sinjani leso sikweletu?
Explanation: Isikweletu esine {security} sine {collateral}, okusho ukuthi umkweletisi angeke alahlekelwe lutho uma ekuboleka imali wena ungasakhoni ukukhokha

Question content: Yini kwezibhaliwe engaba yi {security} esikweletini?
Explanation: Chama iyiphi impahla ebalulekile ebiza imali eyanele ingaba yi {collateral} yesikweletu. Lokhu kuzothintwa yimali yesikweletu kanye nemibandela yesivumelwano

Question content: Sonke isikweletu esi {secure} siba ne {security}
Explanation: i{Collateral} yenza isikweletu sibe ne {security}. Umkweletisi engaba nokuthula azi ukuthi uma ungakhokhi imali yesikweletu angeke elahlekelwe yimali

Question content: Uma uthenga imoto ngesikweletu namhlanje, imoto izoba ngekabani?
Explanation: Uma uthenga imoto ngesikweletu, imoto akusiyo eyakho. i{Title} lingena egameni lakho uma usuqedile ukukhokhela isikweletu. Imoto kuba ngeyakho uma usuyikhokhele ngokugcwele ({in full})

Question content: Uma uthola i{home loan} e{bank} ukuthenga indlu, ekabani indlu?
Explanation: Uma uthatha i{home loan}, itayitela ({title deed}) kuba ngeyakho. Kusho ukuthi indlu ngeyakho, ngisho ngabe ingathathwa indlu uma ungakhokhi

Question content: Isikweletu esine {security} ingabe siba {{nenzalo encance}} kunesikweletu esinganayo i{security}?
Explanation: Uma isikweletu noma i{loan} sine {security} ngoba khona into yakho obambhise ngayo, inzalo ijwayele ukuba ncane kuna mangabe ingekho i{security}. Lokhu ingoba i{risk} incane uma kune {security}

Question content: Isikweletu esi {unsecure} isikweletu esinganayo i{security}
Explanation: Uma ukweleta imali kungekho lutho ovumile ukumnika umkweletisi uma ungakhoni ukukhokha, leso sikweletu asikho {secure} ({unsecured credit})

Question content: Isikweletu esingasekiwe yi {security} sibizwa ngokuthi sinjani?
Explanation: Uma ukweleta imali kungekho lutho ovumile ukumnika umkweletisi uma ungakhoni ukukhokha, leso sikweletu asikho {secure} ({unsecured credit})

Question content: Uma uthatha isikweletu esingena {security}, kusho ukuthini isikweletu esinjani leso?
Explanation: Izikweletu ezinganayo i{security} zijwayele ukuba nenzalo enkulu ngoba akukho {security} ukukhokhela umkweletisi uma ungakhoni ukukhokha

Question content: Iziphi kwezibhaliwe ejwayele ukuba yisikweletu esi {unsecured}?
Explanation: Ama {personal loan} avela kumkweletisi womthetho ajwayele ukungabi na {security} uma uwathatha, kodwa inzalo ijwayele ukuba nkulu

Question content: Iziphi kwezibhaliwe ejwayele ukuba yisikweletu esi {unsecured}?
Explanation: Ngisho ekhona ama {credit card} ane {security}, amaningi ayisikweletu esi {unsecured} asebenza ngokukhokha kahle kwakho ukulethela umkweletisi ukuthula

Question content: Iziphi kwezibhaliwe ejwayele ukuba yisikweletu esi {unsecured}?
Explanation: Ama {account} ezitolo zokugqoka ayizikweletu ezingezi ne {security}

Question content: Isikweletu sendlu okuyi {home loan} sihlale sine {security}
Explanation: i{Home loan} ine {security} ngoba indlu iba yi{security}. Uma uyeka noma ungasakhoni ukukhokha futhi ungenzi iplani, indlu yakho ingathathwa yi {bank}

Question content: Isikweletu sendlu ekuyi {home loan} isibonelo sesikweletu esi {{unsecure}}
Explanation: i{Home loan} ine {security} ngoba indlu iba yi{security}. Uma uyeka noma ungasakhoni ukukhokha futhi ungenzi iplani, indlu yakho ingathathwa yi {bank}

Question content: Isikweletu esingekho {secure} sinenzalo ephezulu ngoba______________
Explanation: Izikweletu ezinganayo i{security} zijwayele ukuba nenzalo enkulu ngoba akukho {security} ukukhokhela umkweletisi uma ungakhoni ukukhokha

Question content: Iziphi kwezibhaliwe ezinzalo ephezulu?
Explanation: i{Home loan} ine {security} ngoba indlu iba yi{security}. Uma uyeka noma ungasakhoni ukukhokha futhi ungenzi iplani, indlu yakho ingathathwa yi {bank}

Question content: Ebakweletisini, isikweletu esingekho {secure} ({unsecured credit}) sine {risk} enkulu kunesikweletu esi {secure}
Explanation: Izikweletu ezinganayo i{security} zijwayele ukuba nenzalo enkulu ngoba akukho {security} ukukhokhela umkweletisi uma ungakhoni ukukhokha

Question content: Izikweletu ezi {unsecure} ziyingozi
Explanation: Izikweletu ezingenayo i{security} azisiyo ingozi, kodwa zibizwa kanjalo ngoba akunanto yakho ({security}) umkweletisi ayithathayo uma ungakhoni ukukhokha. i{Security} yehlisa i{risk} yesikweletu
